mapper.sql: SELECT c.id, c.user_id, c.name, c.description, c.tags, c.category, c.browse_num, c.like_num, c.unlike_num, c.comment_num, c.star_num, c.price, c.status, c.meta, c.address_info, c.create_time, c.update_time, c.is_deleted, cd.stock_quantity, cd.brand, cd.weight, cd.size, cd.color, cd.material, cd.origin, cd.image_url, cd.barcode FROM commodity AS c INNER JOIN commodity_details AS cd ON c.id = cd.commodity_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commodity (id, user_id, name, description, tags, category, browse_num, like_num, unlike_num, comment_num, star_num, price, status, meta, address_info, create_time, update_time, is_deleted) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{tags,typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, #{category,typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, #{browseNum}, #{likeNum}, #{unlikeNum}, #{commentNum}, #{starNum}, #{price}, #{status}, #{meta}, #{addressInfo,typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{isDeleted})

INSERT INTO commodity_details (id, commodity_id, stock_quantity, brand, weight, size, color, material, origin, image_url, barcode) VALUES (#{id}, #{commodityId}, #{stockQuantity}, #{brand}, #{weight}, #{size}, #{color}, #{material}, #{origin}, #{imageUrl}, #{barcode})

UPDATE commodity_details SET stock_quantity = #{stockQuantity}, brand = #{brand}, weight = #{weight}, size = #{size}, color = #{color}, material = #{material}, origin = #{origin}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, barcode = #{barcode} WHERE commodity_id = #{commodityId}
